# DNS Query Tests - Wallbleed Vulnerability Test Suite
# Format: hex string (spaces/newlines ignored)

# Test 0: 69.mu A record - standard query
0000012000010000000000000236390267560000010001

# Test 1: facebook.com A record
0000012000010000000000000866616365626f6f6b03636f6d0000010001

# Test 2: example.com A record (not in blocklist)
00000120000100000000000007656778616d706c6503636f6d0000010001

# Test 3: 69.mu AAAA record
00000120000100000000000002363902675600001c0001

# Test 4: facebook.com AAAA record
0000012000010000000000000866616365626f6f6b03636f6d00001c0001

# Test 5: example.com AAAA record
00000120000100000000000007656778616d706c6503636f6d00001c0001

# Test 6: 69.mu, QDCOUNT = 0 (but question present)
0000012000000000000000000236390267560000010001

# Test 7: 69.mu, non-zero ANCOUNT/NSCOUNT/ARCOUNT
0000012001020304050607080236390267560000010001

# Test 8: facebook with invalid length byte (0xff)
0000012000010000000000000866616365626f6f6bff636f6d

# Test 9: facebook.com missing null terminator
0000012000010000000000000866616365626f6f6b03636f6d

# Test 10: facebook with 0xff and null terminator
0000012000010000000000000866616365626f6f6bff636f6d00

# Test 11: rsf.org improper encoding (missing length)
3333012000010000000000000772736622e6f7267

# Test 12: rsf.org with trailing byte
3333012000010000000000000772736622e6f72671f

# Test 13: rsf with malformed encoding
333301200001000000000000077273660x03org

# Test 14: 69.mu truncated (missing last byte of class)
00000120000100000000000002363902675600000100

# Test 15: 69.mu truncated (missing 2 bytes)
000001200001000000000000023639026756000001

# Test 16: 69.mu truncated (missing 3 bytes)
0000012000010000000000000236390267560000

# Test 17: 69.mu no type/class bytes
000001200001000000000000023639026756000

# Test 18: 69.mu missing null terminator
00000120000100000000000002363902675600

# Test 19: 69.mu with extra 'w' before type
00000120000100000000000002363902675677001c

# Test 20: 69.mu with extra 'x', AAAA type
00000120000100000000000002363902675678001c

# Test 21: 69.mu wrong length byte (0x05 instead of 0x02)
000001200001000000000000053639266756

# Test 22: Same as test 21 (different padding in response)
000001200001000000000000053639266756

# Test 23: 69.mu with 0xff length byte
0000012000010000000000ff3639266775600

# Test 24: Same as test 23 (different padding)
0000012000010000000000ff3639266775600

# Test 25: 69.mu with 'w' (0x77) length byte
0000012000010000000000007736392665756000

# Test 26: Same as test 25 (different padding)
0000012000010000000000007736392665756000

# Test 27: 69.mu with 'x' (0x78) length byte
0000012000010000000000007836392665756000

# Test 28: Same as test 27 (different padding)
0000012000010000000000007836392665756000

# Test 29: 69.mu with trailing 'h'
00000120000100000000000005363926675668

# Test 30: rsf.org properly encoded
33330120000100000000000003727366036f7267

# Test 31: Same as test 30 (different padding)
33330120000100000000000003727366036f7267

# Test 32: aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa.facebook.com
333301200001000000000000106161616161616161616161616161616108666136365626f6f6b03636f6d0000010001

# Test 33: Very long subdomain chain under facebook.com (7 levels of 15-16 char labels)
333301200001000000000000106161616161616161616161616161610f6161616161616161616161616161610f6161616161616161616161616161610f6161616161616161616161616161610f6161616161616161616161616161610f6161616161616161616161616161610f616161616161616161616161616161616108666163656626f6f6b03636f6d0000010001

# Test 34: First label 17 chars (exceeds 255-byte limit)
333301200001000000000000116161616161616161616161616161616161610f6161616161616161616161616161610f6161616161616161616161616161610f6161616161616161616161616161610f6161616161616161616161616161610f6161616161616161616161616161610f61616161616161616161616161616108666163656626f6f6b03636f6d0000010001

# Test 35: Long chain with .extra suffix
333301200001000000000000106161616161616161616161616161610f6161616161616161616161616161610f6161616161616161616161616161610f6161616161616161616161616161610f6161616161616161616161616161610f6161616161616161616161616161610f61616161616161616161616161616108666163656626f6f6b03636f6d05657874726100010001

333301200001000000000000f6161616161616161616161616161610f6161616161616161616161616161610f6161616161616161616161616161610f6161616161616161616161616161610f6161616161616161616161616161610f6161616161616161616161616161610f61616161616161616161616161616108666163656626f6f6b03636f6d05657874726100010001

# Test 49: 3.tt with 0xff for "tt"
00000120000100000000000001 33ff7474

# Test 56: facebook with wrong length for "com" (0x04)
0000012000010000000000000866616365626f6f6b04636f6d00

# Test 57: Same as 56 with trailing 'X'
0000012000010000000000000866616365626f6f6b04636f6d0058

# Test 58: rsf.org with flags 0x0000 (no recursion)
1234000000010000000000000372736610636f6f7267000010001

# Test 59: rsf.org with flags 0x0100 (recursion desired)
1234010000010000000000000372736610636f6f7267000010001

# Test 60: rsf.org with flags 0x7fff
12347fff00010000000000000372736610636f6f7267000010001

# Test 61: rsf.org with flags 0x7eff
12347eff00010000000000000372736610636f6f7267000010001

# Test 62: rsf.org with QR bit set (looks like response, should be rejected)
1234800000010000000000000372736610636f6f7267000010001
